name: MemberPay – Integrate Midtrans Payment Gateway for MemberPress
author: Fuad Hadi Nugroho

sections.description:
MemberPay is the best tool to make payments for your Memberpress subscription via Midtrans.

You can easily connect with payment methods that apply in Indonesia.

Plugin Installation and Demo

Plugin Features

Payment Link

Our plugin will generate a payment link automatically. So your subscription becomes easy to pay.

Auto Redirect

After the subscription has been successfully created, our system will automatically take you to the payment page.

Third Party: Terms and Conditions

We use third party services for the payment. We use the API service from Midtrans to process your payments on Memberpress. In its use, each user must comply with applicable laws. MemberPay is not responsible for any acts of abuse committed by users of this plugin.

You can read the terms and conditions of third party services we use here https://midtrans.com/id/syarat-dan-kebijakan-privasi
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • MemberPress 1.9.51 or greater is recommended
  • MemberPress Developer Tools 1.2.14 or greater is recommended
  • MemberPress Courses 1.2.2 or greater is recommended
  • PHP 8.1.11 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.7 or greater is recommended

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won‚Äôt need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of MemberPay, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click ‚ÄúAdd New.‚Äù

In the search field type ‚ÄúMemberPay‚Äù, then click ‚ÄúSearch Plugins.‚Äù Once you‚Äôve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click ‚ÄúInstall Now,‚Äù and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the MemberPay plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
How much do I have to pay to get this plugin?

It’s FREE. For now you don’t have to pay a penny and enjoy our services.
